Name: Crypto Quest
About the game: Crypto Quest is a game about achieving financial independence. Set in a world struggling with the consequences of war and poverty, you will strive to build your own wealth while staying ahead of taxes and rampant inflation. Features: - Trade popular crypto currencies like bitcoin and ethereum. - Invest in stocks, bonds, and real estate to build a passive income stream. - Explore the rough streets of the city and interact with its strange inhabitants. - Buy a crypto currency mining farm and mine for digital currencies. - Work in a variety of jobs to earn money. Don't forget to share your feedback, reviews, suggestions and feature requests.
